tachyon.worker.block

Class BlockMetricsReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.worker.block.BlockStoreEventListenerBase
      • tachyon.worker.block.BlockMetricsReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BlockStoreEventListener

    public final class BlockMetricsReporter
extends BlockStoreEventListenerBase
    This class listens on block events and increases the metrics counters.
